description: This Java class defines the 'Partner' entity for a database, representing business partners with attributes such as name, contact info, address, and metadata fields like createdAt and updatedAt. It uses JPA annotations for ORM mapping.

classes.name: Partner
classes.description: Entity class mapping to 'partners' table, representing a business partner with various contact and metadata fields.

methods.name: Partner
methods.description: Default constructor for the Partner entity.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the partner.

methods.name: getLegalName
methods.description: Returns the legal name of the partner.

methods.name: setLegalName
methods.description: Sets the legal name of the partner.

methods.name: getAddressLine1
methods.description: Returns the first line of the address.

methods.name: setAddressLine1
methods.description: Sets the first line of the address.

methods.name: getAddressLine2
methods.description: Returns the second line of the address.

methods.name: setAddressLine2
methods.description: Sets the second line of the address.

methods.name: isDeleted
methods.description: Returns whether the partner is marked as deleted.
